mapper.select: select review.* from review, product where review.prd_no = product.prd_no and product.pg_no = #{pg_no}
select UNIQUE prd_name from review, product where review.prd_no = product.prd_no and review.prd_no = #{prd_no}

select review.* from review, product where review.prd_no = product.prd_no and product.pg_no = #{pg_no}
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(REPLACE(rev_content,' ','')), '[[:punct:]]', '') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(REPLACE(#{keyword},' ','')), '[[:punct:]]', '')||'%'
select review.* from review, product where review.prd_no = product.prd_no and product.pg_no = #{pg_no} order by review.rev_star_rate DESC
select review.* from review, product where review.prd_no = product.prd_no and product.pg_no = 3 order by review.rev_date DESC
select * from (select review.* from review, product where review.prd_no = product.prd_no and product.pg_no = #{pg_no}) where rev_star_rate = #{starAmount}
SELECT count(*) FROM review, product WHERE review.prd_no = product.prd_no and product.pg_no = ${pg_no}
